column4: yes, I am booting from a usb and sometimes I get to the purple screen with the ubuntu graphic, sometimes I don't. When I do get to the purple screen, it never goes past the place where the dots are loading.
Sometimes it has gone to the place that the dots all turn orange and then start to turn back to white, but never has gotten past the last two dots turning back to white...
(don't know if any of that is helpful/useful but that is what I get to....)
pres F2 to turn off the splash and tell us what it says its doing
